name: Heaven
description: GitHub flow with capistrano, fabric, and heroku.

GITHUB_TOKEN.description: A personal OAuth token from GitHub with repo scope.

GITHUB_CLIENT_ID.description: A client id from a GitHub OAuth app you created.

GITHUB_CLIENT_SECRET.description: A client secret from a GitHub OAuth app you created.

GITHUB_TEAM_ID.description: A GitHub team id number to restrict resque access to.

DEPLOYMENT_TIMEOUT.description: The maximum amount of time a deployment can take in seconds.

RAILS_ENV.description: This is what the RAILS_ENV unix environmental variable is set to.

RAILS_SECRET_KEY_BASE.description: Unique token for signing cookies. This is generated.

HEROKU_API_KEY.description: A direct authorization token from heroku.(Optional)
